text: arṣaya usulā gena siṭinnan hā ē avaṭa siṭinnan ovungē paramādhipatigē praśaṁsāva tuḷin suviśuddha karati. tavada ohuva viśvāsa karati. tavada apagē paramādhipatiyāṇeni! dayāven hā dænumen siyalu dǣ oba puḷul lesa āvaraṇaya kara siṭinnehiya. eheyin pasutævili vī obagē mārgaya anugamanaya kaḷavunhaṭa oba samāva denu mænava! tavada nirayē vēdanāven oba ovun ārakṣā karanu mænava! yæyi viśvāsa kaḷavunaṭa samāva ayæda siṭiti
